explanation: Multiple participants noted a downtrend starting for BTC, with key support levels being broken (notably $106,500) and discussions of a further fall to $104,000. Several referenced heavy red candles and a recent value drop, with warnings to close longs and some users mentioning large losses from long positions. There is also significant uncertainty and volatility, with some expecting a temporary recovery but most short-term sentiment bearish.
